comments: Schroder (BOS) commits a take foul on Plumlee (CHA).
Hayward (CHA) legally contests Tatum's (BOS) jump shot attempt.
Bridges (CHA) turns into Tatum's (BOS) body and the contact affects his shot attempt at the basket.
Tatum (BOS) momentarily grasps Bridges (CHA) while trying to defend around the pick, but the contact does not affect his FOM.
Ball (CHA) does not establish the ball in the frontcourt after 8 seconds elapses.
Smart (BOS) cleanly dislodges the inbound pass without making contact to Ball's (CHA) arm.

Hayward (CHA) deflects the inbound pass and although Tatum (BOS) makes contact with the ball in the frontcourt, never establishes a positive position until he secures possession of the ball in the backcourt.
Ball (CHA) reaches in and makes contact to Tatum's (BOS) head/face that causes him to lose possession of the ball.
Williams III (BOS) extends his hip into the lower body of Ball during the pick and affects his ability to defend.
Schroder (BOS) moves alongside and legally contests the driving shot attempt by Oubre Jr. (CHA).
Bridges (CHA) jumps from point A to point B but the contact with Brown (BOS) is marginal during the dunk.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) commits a take foul on Schroder (BOS).
Ball (CHA) extends his off-arm into Smart's (BOS) body and dislodges him from his guarding position to create space.
Schroder (BOS) jumps vertically and maintains a legal vertical position contesting the driving shot attempt by Oubre Jr. (CHA).
Bridges (CHA) commits a take foul on Schroder (BOS).
Oubre Jr. (CHA) makes contact with Tatum's (BOS) arm that affects his shot near the rim.
